text: The Toronto Marlies are a Canadian professional ice hockey team that began playing in 2005. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Toronto Maple Leafs of the NHL. They play their home games in Toronto, Ontario at the Ricoh Coliseum. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Reading Royals. ==Other websites== *Toronto Marlies' Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in Ontario Category:Toronto Maple Leafs Category:2005 establishments in Canada
title: Toronto Marlies
